input.sentences: i was prepared for the 10k run .
i quickly went to registration and signed in ...
and | walked outside and received my number .
and | we were off to the races .
output.sentences: Steve woke up early and arrived with hours to spare on the day of the marathon.
Registration was well-organized and easily completed.
People milled about in the hours before the race began.
Finally, the competition was underway and runners were on the move.
The winner was celebrated vigorously with rousing cheers and applause.
